title: Omar Hayat
text:
I am an incoming MMath in Computational Mathematics student at the University of Waterloo.
My supervisors are Dr. Giang Tran and Dr. Saeed Ghadimi.
I obtained my BSc in Computer Science and Mathematics from the University of Ottawa. #### Brief CV ___ ##### Education  MMath Computational Mathematics   University of Waterloo  Sep 2024 — Aug 2025  
 Honours BSc Computer Science and Mathematics   University of Ottawa  Sep 2018 — May 2023  


Work Experience
 Data Engineering Intern  National Research Council of Canada — Automotive and Surface Transportation Centre  May 2022 — Dec 2022 | Ottawa, ON   
 Data Science Intern  Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC)  Sep 2021 — Dec 2021 | Ottawa,ON   
 Data Science Intern   Novartis AG   May 2020 — Dec 2020 | Remote  



Extra Curricular Experience
 Software Engineering Team Lead  Engineering Competition Team — UO Supermileage  Sep 2021 — Sep 2022  
 Printed Circuit Board Designer  Engineering Competition Team — UO Supermileage  Jan 2019 — Sep 2021

title: Omar Hayat
text:
I am an incoming MMath in Computational Mathematics student at the University of Waterloo in Fall 2024.
I am co-supervised by Dr. Giang Tran and Dr. Saeed Ghadimi
I am in the process of building my theoretical foundation and finding research direction in the areas of optimization and machine learning.
My long term goal is to be an active researcher in these spaces.
